about_the_game:
Office Dreaming is an exciting puzzle game for finding objects in a cozy office.
This game is a great way to relax after a hard day and get away from problems. Intuitive gameplay and a calm atmosphere does not bother the player and allows you to immediately immerse yourself in the process.
Melodious light music creates an atmosphere of calm and relaxation in the game.
Some items will be easier to find. And some items will have to work hard to find! There are many items on the location, there are numerous tables, office equipment, gaming tables and other office decorations. The player must explore every part of the location to find the necessary items.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4670K (4 * 3400) or equivalent / AMD FX-8350 (4 * 4000) or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 960 (4 GB)
